snippet: Mr. Fischer was influential in jazz and arranged pop and R&B compositions for the likes of Paul McCartney, Michael Jackson, Prince and Celine Dion.
abstract: Clare Fischer, prolific composer, arranger, conductor and keyboardist, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Fischer was influential in jazz and arranged pop and R&B compositions for the likes of Paul McCartney, Michael Jackson, Prince and Celine Dion.

headline.seo: Clare Fischer, Arranger and Keyboardist, Is Dead at 83
headline.main: Clare Fischer, Arranger and Keyboardist, Is Dead at 83
headline.print_headline: Clare Fischer, 83, Versatile Arranger and Keyboardist
